svg.title: Test getPathLength and getPointAtLength interfaces
svg.script: var svgNamespaceURI = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"; var doc; function doLength(cnt, dist) { var p = doc.getElementById("p"+cnt); var l = doc.getElementById("l"+cnt); var c = doc.getElementById("c"+cnt); var len, pt; len = p.getTotalLength(); pt = p.getPointAtLength(dist); l.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(("Len: " + len).substring(0, 10))); c.setAttribute("cx", ""+pt.getX()); c.setAttribute("cy", ""+pt.getY()); } function load(evt) { doc = evt.target.getOwnerDocument(); doLength(1, 25); doLength(2, 25); doLength(3, 25); doLength(4, 25); doLength(5, 25); doLength(6, 25); doLength(7, (78.546)/2); doLength(8, 25); }
